title: Piles (haemorrhoids)
description: Piles (haemorrhoids) are swellings inside or around the bottom. They are common and often clear up on their own after a few days.

header.value: Piles (haemorrhoids) are swellings inside or around the bottom. They are common and often clear up on their own after a few days.

value.caption: They can be small lumps, around the size of a pea
value.alt: A small clump of skin coloured piles around the rim of the anus and each about the size of a pea

value.caption: They can be pink or purple
value.alt: A small purple coloured pile on the rim of the anus and about the size of a pea

value.caption: They can grow into larger lumps, the size of grapes
value.alt: A clump of larger sized piles around the rim of the anus, each about the size of a small grape and a reddy purple colour
